info.name: Bluezy III.5
info.description: A modification of Bluezy The Second that I made to fix some of the problems that I had with it.
info.additionalInfo:
All credit goes to the creator of Bluezy II, Sarah Vessels (https://userstyles.org/users/335617). I'd also recommend Bluezy the Third (https://userstyles.org/styles/131977/bluezy-the-third), another theme with the same idea.

Changes from Bluezy II:
-fixed readability of some text.
-Fixed comments view, notifications view, accounts view, communities view, and chat view that weren't affected by the theme.
